CustomField.description: Created on 12-04-2015. Used to calculate Credits from Ledger using trigger. Deployed in v1.90
CustomField.formula: IF( TEXT( Type ) = 'Supplier', Zumzum__Total_Credit__c - Zumzum__Total_Debit__c , Zumzum__Total_Debit__c - Zumzum__Total_Credit__c)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: For Customers, calculated from Total Credits less Total Debits, For Suppliers, calculated from Total Debits less Total Credits
CustomField.label: Total Balance
